Description.Title: UpdateLeafFlag model
Description.Abstract: tells if flag leaf has appeared and update the calendar if so

Input.description: list containing for each stage occured its cumulated thermal times
Input.name: calendarCumuls

Input.description: List containing appearance of each stage
Input.name: calendarMoments

Input.description: List containing the dates of the wheat developmental phases
Input.name: calendarDates

Input.description: true if flag leaf has appeared (leafnumber reached finalLeafNumber)
Input.name: hasFlagLeafLiguleAppeared_t1

Output.description: list containing for each stage occured its cumulated thermal times
Output.name: calendarCumuls

Output.description: List containing appearance of each stage
Output.name: calendarMoments

Output.description: List containing the dates of the wheat developmental phases
Output.name: calendarDates

Output.description: true if flag leaf has appeared (leafnumber reached finalLeafNumber)
Output.name: hasFlagLeafLiguleAppeared
